text: Brand new here--CTO of a small tech consulting company, new HubSpotter as well. Nice to connect with other new users

What's up Jami! Welcome to the community - we're super excited to have you :luke::smiley::sprocket: How's your HubSpot CMS experience been so far? Have you been able to play around with a sandbox portal?

Welcome <@UEBN3R872> :slightly_smiling_face: We're super excited to have you a part of our community!! We're looking forward to collaborating.

Do you have any questions so far? How has your experience been?

Hi <@UEC65BQV8> - Welcome to the community! We're super excited to have ya. We have a number of HubSpot employees in SF. :slightly_smiling_face:

Internally, we've been dreaming of the idea of a headless-CMS ... would be exciting for the developers. :slightly_smiling_face: For now we have a pretty solid front-end and building more and more of the API/flexibility for devs each day.

For dynamic content, you'll want to dive deep into <#C22PDRW72|data-driven-content>. Would be interesting to post your feedback in that channel too as some of the HubSpot product team is in there looking for feedback/ideas.
How has your experience been so far?? Have you been able to play around with a sandbox CMS? Any questions?

Thanks for reaching out! I am just getting into the sandbox and trying to figure out the flow for building local templates, using the local hubl server and pushing with FTP. Want to get a feel what it looks like end to end
